org.braincopy

クラス Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.braincopy.File
      • org.braincopy.Picture

  • public class Picture
extends File
    is a class to abstract picture files such as jpg, png, and gif.
    作成者:
    Hiroaki Tateshita

    • フィールドのサマリー

      • クラスから継承されたフィールド org.braincopy.File

        fileName

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明

      construct a new Picture object.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      checks the filename of picture files correct or not.

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド org.braincopy.File

        getFileName

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Picture

        public Picture(String _fileName)
        throws IllegalFileNameException
        construct a new Picture object. Currently Braincopy library use "jpg", "png", "gif", "jpeg" as file extension of Picture files. So when other extensions such as xcf cannot be used as picture file, this object should throw exception.
        パラメータ:
        _fileName - { "jpg", "png", "gif", "jpeg" }
        例外:
        IllegalFileNameException - is thrown if the file name is not picture's name.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • isPictureFileName

        public static boolean isPictureFileName(String fileName)
        checks the filename of picture files correct or not. Currently Braincopy library use "jpg", "png", "gif", "jpeg" as file extension of Picture files.]
        パラメータ:
        fileName - is the name of file which you may want to check.
        戻り値:
        true if this fileName has the extension of picture file such as "jpg" and "gif", false otherwise
